languages.text: "Тсссс! Тише! Не вздумай болтать об этом вот так, да еще и здесь!"
"Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"
languages.original_text: "Тсссс! Тише! Не вздумай болтать об этом вот так, да еще и здесь!"

traits.locale_text: "Hush! Quiet! Don't you dare talk about it like this, here of all places!"
"Hush! Quiet! Don't you dare talk about it like this, here of all places!"
"Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"
"Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"
"Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"

languages.text: “嘘！安静！有那么多地方可以聊，不要偏在这里说这种话！”
languages.original_text: "Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"

traits.locale_text: “嘘！安静！有那么多地方可以聊，不要偏在这里说这种话！”

languages.text: «¡Calla! ¡No hables de eso así, y menos aquí!».
languages.original_text: "Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Calla! ¡No hables de eso así, y menos aquí!».

languages.text: 「シー！静かに！よりによって、こんなところでそんな話をするな！」
languages.original_text: "Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"

traits.locale_text: 「シー！静かに！よりによって、こんなところでそんな話をするな！」

languages.text: "Seid still! Kein Wort mehr! Sprecht nicht so darüber, schon gar nicht hier!"
languages.original_text: "Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"

traits.locale_text: "Seid still! Kein Wort mehr! Sprecht nicht so darüber, schon gar nicht hier!"

languages.text: « Chut ! Mets-la en sourdine, bon sang ! C'est pas le genre de choses qu'on crie sur tous les toits, surtout pas ici ! »
languages.original_text: "Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"

traits.locale_text: « Chut ! Mets-la en sourdine, bon sang ! C'est pas le genre de choses qu'on crie sur tous les toits, surtout pas ici ! »

languages.text: "Sus! Sessiz ol! Bu meseleyi yüksek sesle dile getirme, hele ki burada!"
languages.original_text: "Hush! Quiet! Don't talk about it like that, here of all places!"

traits.locale_text: "Hişt! Sessiz ol! Bundan öyle yüksek sesle bahsetme, hele ki burada!"
